metadata.title: Thursday,18th July, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) when the Food Reserve Agency (FRA) will pay farmers for the maize supplied during the 2017/2018 marketing season, countrywide;
(b) how much money the FRA owes the farmers, province by province; and
(c) what has caused the delay in paying the farmers.
(a) when the tarring of the Lundazi-Chama road will commence;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is;
(c) what the total cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) when the tarring of the Isoka-Mafinga road will resume;
(b) what the cause of the delay in resuming the project is;
(c) who the contractor for the project is;
(d) what the total cost of the project is; and
(e) what the time frame for the completion of the outstanding works is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to procure desks for schools in Serenje Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) how many desks will be procured; and
(d) what the total cost of the exercise is.
